summary: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.
cast: Milla Jovovich|Oded Fehr|Ali Larter|Iain Glen|Ashanti|Christopher Egan|Spencer Locke|Matthew Marsden|Linden Ashby|Jason O'Mara|Mike Epps|Joe Hursley|John Eric Bentley|James Tumminia|Kirk B.R. Woller|Rick Cramer|Madeline Carroll|Peter O'Meara|William Abadie|Ramón Franco|Shane Woodson|Valorie Hubbard|Geoff Meed|Rusty Joiner|Brian Steele|Connor McCoy|Carolina Jimenez|Gary A. Hecker|Martin Crewes|Carrie Eklund|Richard Epcar|Stefen Hayes|Gary Hudson|Ryan McCluskey|Carsten Norgaard|César Ámigo Aguilar
title: Resident Evil: Extinción
